alfredsnippet.snippet:
"There are no forbidden questions in science, no matters too sensitive or delicate to be probed, no sacred truths. That openness to new ideas, combined with the most rigorous, skeptical scrutiny of all ideas, sifts the wheat from the chaff ... Diversity and debate are valued. Opinions are encouraged to contend -- substantively and in depth."

- Carl Sagan
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Sagan on Disagreement in Science
